/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with the exception of the brightly colored buildings which stand out against the otherwise subdued palette.
